scripts.lint: npx @redocly/cli lint schema/openapi.yaml --skip-rule security-defined --skip-rule operation-2xx-response --skip-rule operation-4xx-response
scripts.docs: npm run emit && npx openapi-generate-html --input=schema/openapi.yaml --output=dist/index.html --ui=stoplight --title='Catapult REST Endpoints'
scripts.preview: npm run docs && npx serve dist/
